_components._string: Because of the retreat of glaciers on the Antarctic peninsula, two invasive species have been found to be spreading without control, threatening the local ecosystem. What can be done?
_components._N$string: Because of the retreat of glaciers on the Antarctic peninsula, two invasive species have been found to be spreading without control, threatening the local ecosystem. What can be done?

_components._string: Because of the retreat of glaciers on the Antarctic peninsula, two invasive species have been found to be spreading without control, threatening the local ecosystem. What can be done?
_components._N$string: Because of the retreat of glaciers on the Antarctic peninsula, two invasive species have been found to be spreading without control, threatening the local ecosystem. What can be done?

_components._string: Adopt a systematic, DNA barcoding and web-based surveillance system, which will enable rapid identification of other ‘unusual’ species in order to curb their spread on the peninsula?
_components._N$string: Adopt a systematic, DNA barcoding and web-based surveillance system, which will enable rapid identification of other ‘unusual’ species in order to curb their spread on the peninsula?
